rows.label: qev025701_MSG0001
rows.name:
Our brand, Belle Betty Fashions, prides itself on offering
products made FOR women, BY women—no matter
what species they may be![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0002
rows.name:
But so far, we've only been able to reach a human
audience.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0003
rows.name:
If we want to succeed on Mira, we need to start
bringing Ma-non women into the fold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0004
rows.name:
Which is precisely what I've tasked Panyar here to
accomplish as head of our new Ma-non sales division.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0005
rows.name:
Hello hello! Leave it to me, okay? As the rising star of
non-human fashion, I'm positioned to revolutionize
Ma-non apparel, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0006
rows.name:
But but but, in your opinion, how does current Ma-non
fashion strike you? Doesn't it just all look the same?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev025701_SEL0011
rows.name: Confess that all Ma-non clothes look shockingly similar.

rows.label: qev025701_JNK0020
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev025701_SEL0021
rows.name: Praise Ma-non clothing as individual and varied.

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0007
rows.name: Ah! You have very very fine taste, don't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0008
rows.name:
You see, we Ma-non have no custom of wearing
clothes specifically designed for one's own body.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0009
rows.name: Really? Hmm. I think I may question your taste level?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0010
rows.name:
You see, we Ma-non have no custom of wearing
clothes specifically designed for one's own body.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0011
rows.name:
Most Ma-non will throw on anything, even if it's too
too too big and not especially flattering, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0012
rows.name:
...Ah HA! I have it, yes? Victoria, you need to craft
undergarments like the ones you humans wear,
but in Ma-non sizes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0013
rows.name:
That sort of subtle, concealed fashion is fantastic,
isn't it? Very very confidence-boosting?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0014
rows.name:
That's an interesting idea, Panyar. Though we'll need to
do some research—I have no idea what kind of size
chart to use for a Ma-non.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0015
rows.name: Maybe we'll just have my my good friend here do it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0016
rows.name:
It is decided. Go into town and ask three Ma-non
for their measurements, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_JNK0030
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev025701_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask if Ma-non will be willing to share that information.

rows.label: qev025701_JNK0040
rows.name: Backpedal

rows.label: qev025701_SEL0041
rows.name:
Inform Panyar that you'd be far to embarrassed
to ask people for their sizes.

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0017
rows.name:
Why, do humans keep such data secret?
It seems so so narrow-minded, doesn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0018
rows.name:
Ma-non are very very open about such question,
you know? So will you go ask them?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0019
rows.name:
Embarrassed? But but it's only data, isn't it?
Raw numbers?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0020
rows.name:
Such questions are no bother to us Ma-non, you see?
So there is no cause to be embarrassed, okay?
Plus I am very very very busy, so it has to be you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0021
rows.name:
I need Panyar to stay here and start working up
some designs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0022
rows.name:
I understand it's rather sudden, but would you mind
helping us? We can shake up the New LA apparel
scene together![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0023
rows.name:
Oh, and in addition to the measurements, we need
material to craft the garments. A handful of supple
leather would be perfect if you can track some down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0024
rows.name:
I appreciate all your help. This division is brand new,
so we're still rather understaffed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0025
rows.name:
Many many thanks. Let me give you the names of three
of my friends who are likely to give you their
measurements, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0026
rows.name:
For juniors, talk to Veverta. For misses, see Aalis.
And for the older woman, ask Vyponne. Okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0027
rows.name:
They should all be in New LA somewhere.
So go get those measurements, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0028
rows.name:
Ma-non haven't ever worn underwear before.
If this goes well, we're looking at a huge new market.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0029
rows.name: I knew I made the right decision recruiting Panyar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0030
rows.name:
Done with your survey of Ma-non ladies? Then we're
just waiting on the materials. Five pieces of supple
leather, please.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0031
rows.name:
I asked a BLADE acquaintance, and she said the
creatures called lepyxes are a reliable source.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0032
rows.name:
Panyar is fascinating to watch. It's just one fresh new
idea after the next with her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0033
rows.name:
If we can bring those ideas to market, I really think we
can revolutionize the way Ma-non women dress.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0034
rows.name:
And how are you progressing? Are the materials and
measurements ready?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0035
rows.name:
Great, this should be plenty! We can start cutting
samples right away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0036
rows.name:
Say, Panyar? Once the samples are complete, will you
be the first to model one for us?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0037
rows.name:
I would be very very very happy to be the first ever
underwear underwearer in Ma-non history, wouldn't I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0038
rows.name: Excellent. We'll have them stitched in no time flat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0039
rows.name: ...Perfect. They're ready when you are, Panyar![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0040
rows.name:
Copy that. I'll be right back, okay? I can't wait to see
how they feel on me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0041
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0042
rows.name: Gwaugh! Nrrraaaaaugh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0043
rows.name:
What what WHAT is this? Being squeezed like this is
very very very uncomfortable, you know?
This isn't fashion! It's...it's bondage![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0044
rows.name:
Do you really wear things like these?
Aren't they so so awful?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_JNK0050
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev025701_SEL0051
rows.name: Explain that it feels normal enough to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_JNK0060
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev025701_SEL0061
rows.name: Say that you prefer going commando.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0045
rows.name: You're amazing, aren't you now? Heroic, even?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0046
rows.name:
If I had to stay bound up like this all the time,
I would lose my mind, probably? I don't know?
Anyway, I'm taking these off right now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0047
rows.name:
Right! This crushy-squeezy feeling is unbearable, isn't it?
I'm taking these off right now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0048
rows.name:
Do you really wear things like these?
Aren't they so so awful?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_JNK0070
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev025701_SEL0071
rows.name: Explain that men's underwear is less restrictive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_JNK0080
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev025701_SEL0081
rows.name: Say that you know EXACTLY how she feels.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0049
rows.name:
Males and females wear different kinds, do they?
Hmm. It seems Earth women have a harsh lot, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0050
rows.name:
This crushy-squeezy feeling is unbearable!
I'm taking these off now, okay? Right right off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0051
rows.name:
You know exactly how she... So, uh, wait.
You wear women's underwear?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0052
rows.name:
Not that I'm judging! All of our customers are
equally important to us here at Belle Betty Fashions![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0053
rows.name:
I can't bear it any longer, can I?
I'm taking these off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0054
rows.name:
Phew... I thought I might die for a minute!
Even for fashion, there are limits to what I'll do, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0055
rows.name:
I suppose underwear could be a bit of a hard sell if
you aren't used to it. I didn't think of that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0056
rows.name:
Maybe we should try approaching the Ma-non
customer through cosmetics instead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0057
rows.name:
Hmm, that reminds me. Victoria, you have a very
nice smell. Better than most other humans, right?
Were you maybe born different?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0058
rows.name:
I wear perfume. It's an aromatic spray made from a
combination of pleasing scents.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0059
rows.name: Oh! Another form of invisible fashion, yes? Excellent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0060
rows.name: I think Ma-non are much more likely to enjoy this, no?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0061
rows.name:
A new fragrance made especially for the Ma-non
woman... I think it might actually work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0062
rows.name:
Then it's time for our good good friend to go collect
the scents we Ma-non enjoy, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0063
rows.name:
After that, we can mix them up into a dangerously
fresh new perfume, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0064
rows.name:
Panyar's proposed a mix of sona herb and
mondcherry. You should be able to find the former
on Northpointe Beach.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0065
rows.name:
For mondcherries, maybe look around Janpath Lake.
I'm eager to see what sort of scent they make together![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025701_MSG0066
rows.name:
Did you find some suitable ingredients? Go ahead and
hand them over to Panyar, if you would be so kind.[ST:wait ]
